Interiorista Studio is a multi-disciplinary design studio based in Montreal.

We work internationally providing services within design and interiors, our body of work includes retail stores, brand support, packaging, landscaping, furniture design, interior partial or full renovation and new construction on commercial and residential projects.



Our team is composed of experienced designers with multi-cultural backgrounds, each one possessing a unique and broad skill set and a passion for great design. The diversity of the team enables us to represent both local and global mindsets and contributes to our ability to respond to cultural views. We approach every project with an emphasis on collaboration and with a focus on understanding the unique personality of each of our clients and to bring their vision into reality. We take pride in offering artful, memorable environments that enrich everyday life. We work with a range of aesthetics, from contemporary to classical, whimsical or formal and are experts at combining tradition with modernity, always striving to achieve meaningful solutions through a detailed exploration of color, shapes, materials, space, and light, finding the balance between comfort, function, and beauty.
